description:
This game gives you the feeling that such a real race without rules. Difficult battles against each other will provide you with very vivid emotions. A variety of cars and racing tracks will not let you get bored while playing. For practice, you can check out the Arcade mode. And for the more adventurous and experienced, there is an mode Championship with different tipe of deficlty. The Versus game mode will give you the opportunity to fight with your friends. Different abilities you can pickup , both useful and interfering with your victory, will not let you relax.

Features:
- Nice and stylized graphics.
- Variety of cars.
- Advanced AI.
- Variety of Maps.
name: MiniCar Extreme Car Driving Racing (Truck, Suv, Sedan, Cars)
